entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR

HIGHS AROUND 70

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 50

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
